subject: We are ready to give you a loan
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this lot will expire THIS NIGHT):
$342,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!!
http://atalykjlgent.com/
